subject: Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Designated hitter David Ortiz, 36, and the Boston Red Sox avoided salary arbitration by agreeing to a one-year contract worth $14,575,000.
snippet: Designated hitter David Ortiz, 36, and the Boston Red Sox avoided salary arbitration by agreeing to a one-year contract worth $14,575,000.
